Interface Entity.Builder<B extends Entity.Builder<B>>

Type Parameters:
B - the builder type
All Superinterfaces:
Entity, Supplier<CharSequence>
All Known Subinterfaces:
Meta.Builder<B>
Enclosing interface:
Entity
public static interface Entity.Builder<B extends Entity.Builder<B>> extends Entity
Responsible for providing an easy way to build a meta instance used when logging
